ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_bj-xpimasn | |- ( ( A X. B ) " { X } ) = if ( X e. A , B , (/) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_iftrue | |- ( X e. A -> if ( X e. A , B , (/) ) = B ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( X e. A -> ( ( A X. B ) " { X } ) = B ) |
\
 The image of a singleton by a direct product, nonempty case.  [To replace ~ xpimasn ] (Contributed by BJ, 6-Apr-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
